alert.note: Alert for Cotton (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 03 at 8:29AM CDT until June 04 at 7:36AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Deep Red Creek near Randlett affecting Cotton County.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC033-040130- /O.EXT.KOUN.FL.W.0007.000000T0000Z-220604T1236Z/ /RNDO2.1.ER.220603T0645Z.220603T1800Z.220604T0636Z.NO/ 829 AM CDT Fri Jun 3 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Deep Red Creek near Randlett. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flood depths up to 1 foot occur over croplands... pastures... and low-lying local roads along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The Deep Red Creek is expected to rise to a crest of 21.4 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
